info.title: Device Info Plugin
info.description: The DeviceInfo plugin allows retrieving of various device-related information.

hdr.description: Does the device support HDR (true or false)

atmos.description: Does the device support Dolby Atmos (true or false)

cec.description: Does the device support HDMI CEC (true or false)

hdcp.description: HDCP version supported by the device (unavailable, hdcp_14, hdcp_20, hdcp_21, hdcp_22)

items.description: Audio output (other, rf_modulator, analog, spdif, hdmi, displayport)
Video output (other, rf_modulator, composite, svideo, component, scart_rgb, hdmi, displayport)
